content: salt of the earth men s crochet beanie pattern - crochet beanie pattern - crochet pdf tutorial - instant download includes instructions for a crochet beanie hat pattern the hat is easy to work in simple stitches ***please note that this pattern is available for free on my linked blog the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern *** materials needed - worsted weight yarn exact brand and color provided - crochet hook size h - tapestry needle for weaving in ends size for an average adult 20 around the beanie is 8 5 long pattern is written in english using standard american terms level beginner/advanced beginner this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer copyright ©2018 crochet 365 knit too do not reproduce sell or copy this pattern in any way you may however sell finished products
